item.title: Zechariah
item.author: johnwry@gmail.com (BJWry)
item.description: Zechariah Return to Me! A prodigal nation comes home Yahweh remembers, Yahweh blesses at the appointed time Now if their transgression is riches for the world and their failure is riches for the Gentiles, how much more will their fulfillment be…for if their rejection is the reconciliation of the world, what will their acceptance be but life from the dead? Romans 11:12, 15 We know there are certain books in the Bible that are not as popular as others.
